participant_1.background:
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
I was a technical support engineer at a small startup before I got my current job.
i have a career in party planning.
I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.

participant_2.background:
I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.
My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.
I'm single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

content.text: Hello there! How's your day going so far?
It's good. I'm just getting started on some party planning.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I'm a bit of a party planner myself.
Really? That's so cool! I've always loved organizing events and making sure everything goes according to plan.
Me too! It's so rewarding to see your hard work pay off and have everyone have a great time.
Exactly! I love seeing people happy and enjoying themselves.
What kind of parties do you like to plan?
I like to plan all sorts of parties, but I especially love planning themed parties.
Me too! I love coming up with creative themes and decorations.
Me too! I think it's so much fun to immerse guests in a different world for a few hours.
I totally agree! It's like taking a mini vacation without ever leaving home.
